name: Stickman Big Air Skateboarding
description:
Start in the back yard and work your way up to the massive stadium ramp. Combine board tricks and spins and try to stick a perfect landing!

* Real skate tricks - kickflips, 360 shovits, frontside 720's and even backflips!

* 3 unique levels to unlock... each one bigger than the last!

* Easy controls

* Addictive skate action

* Compete for the high score on worldwide leaderboards

Over 6 MILLION players have downloaded our Stickman games around the world!

Download now and hit the ramp!
